name: Street Fighter Alpha
description:
bPurchase this PS one® Classic and play it on both your PS3™ and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) systems!/b

FIGHT! The classic Street Fighter® Alpha: Warriors' Dreams returns! With an improved Super Combo system based on Super Street Fighter® II Turbo, the addition of the 'Alpha Counter,' 'Air Blocking,' and 'Chain Combos,' Street Fighter® Alpha set a new standard in versus fighting gameplay.

The cast of characters includes fan-favorites Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, Sagat, M. Bison, and Akuma. Other characters include Birdie and Adon, making their comeback to the roster since their first appearance in the original Street Fighter®, Guy and Sodom from Final Fight, as well as brand new original characters Charlie, Rose, and Dan.

Download this PS one® Classic today!

Transferring to a PSP® system from your PS3™ system:
bYou must be signed into the PlayStation®Network account that originally purchased the game./b You must have at least 80 MB free on your Memory Stick Duo™. Connect your PSP® system to your PS3™ system with a USB cable and switch your PSP® system to USB Mode. Highlight the game on the PS3™ XMB™, press the Δ button and select Copy.

PC Store Customers:
Log into your PlayStation®Network account that you originally used to purchased the game. Then, download the game from your “Download List” in the PlayStation®Store onto your PS3™ system.

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PSP® and the PS3™ systems. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.
